column4: one html site I visit w/ firefox lost the formatting a few days ago; it is a solid white background w/the text on the left. works fine in opera. any ideas? thx
what site was it for you that screwed up? you an pm it if you want
.net is an ad site for me
.com is an actual site, and is formatted etc fine
it looks fine in opera for me, but not in ff. I tried cleaning the cache, removing cookies, idk what else to do.
I'm using FF right now, it's loaded fine
sadly not here. i'm checking LQ atm. Someone is sure to have solved this issue already.
lemme know if that solves it for you, cause if it does I'm gonna probably have to do that here too
i exported the bookmarks, uninstalled, did sudo apt-get autoremove, reinstalled, imported bookmarks, and voila! :) Page formatting is restored.
